class.name: SQLite3
class.description: This class provides static methods for SQLite3 library initialization, version information, and other global operations.

method.name: libversion_number
method.description: Returns the version number of the SQLite library.

method.name: libversion
method.description: Returns the version string of the SQLite library.

method.name: sourceid
method.description: Returns the source ID of the SQLite library.

method.name: initialize
method.description: Initializes the SQLite library. Returns SQLITE_OK on success.

method.name: shutdown
method.description: Shuts down the SQLite library. Returns SQLITE_OK on success.

method.name: os_init
method.description: Initializes the SQLite OS interface. Returns SQLITE_OK on success.

method.name: os_end
method.description: Shuts down the SQLite OS interface. Returns SQLITE_OK on success.

method.name: config
method.description: Configures the SQLite library. The operation and arguments depend on the specific configuration.

method.name: memory_used
method.description: Returns the amount of memory currently in use by SQLite.

method.name: memory_highwater
method.description: Returns the maximum amount of memory used by SQLite. If reset is true, resets the highwater mark.

method.name: mprintf
method.description: Formats a string using SQLite's printf function.

method.name: errstr
method.description: Returns a string describing the given error code.

method.name: threadsafe
method.description: Returns true if SQLite was compiled with thread safety enabled.

method.name: keyword_count
method.description: Returns the number of reserved keywords in SQLite.

method.name: keyword_check
method.description: Returns true if the given string is a reserved keyword in SQLite.

method.name: sleep
method.description: Causes the current thread to sleep for the specified number of milliseconds.

method.name: get_temp_directory
method.description: Returns the temporary directory used by SQLite.

method.name: set_temp_directory
method.description: Sets the temporary directory used by SQLite.

method.name: get_data_directory
method.description: Returns the data directory used by SQLite.

method.name: set_data_directory
method.description: Sets the data directory used by SQLite.

method.name: enable_shared_cache
method.description: Enables or disables the shared cache mode. Returns SQLITE_OK on success.

method.name: release_memory
method.description: Attempts to free the specified amount of memory from SQLite's heap. Returns the amount actually freed.

method.name: soft_heap_limit64
method.description: Sets the soft heap limit for SQLite. Returns the previous limit.

method.name: hard_heap_limit64
method.description: Sets the hard heap limit for SQLite. Returns the previous limit.

method.name: compileoption_used
method.description: Returns true if the given compile option was used when building SQLite.

method.name: compileoption_get
method.description: Returns the N-th compile option used when building SQLite.
